@graph.name: Max Stops Per Route Constraint for Route Optimization
@graph.description: The Max Stops Per Route Add-On enhances route planning by imposing practical constraints on driver workloads. This solution allows businesses to define the maximum number of stops per driver route, ensuring that routes remain feasible and safe while preventing driver fatigue. By balancing total route time with the number of stops per route, the system automatically creates new routes when either threshold is exceeded. This capability is especially valuable for businesses with physical delivery constraints, such as beverage distributors handling heavy products or service providers with time-intensive stops. The add-on integrates seamlessly with Route4Me's optimization engine, allowing you to incorporate your real-world operational knowledge into the automated routing process for more realistic and sustainable route plans.
